survey_name: Corporate Sustainability Initiatives Employee Engagement Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to measure employee awareness, participation, and satisfaction with the company's sustainability initiatives, as well as gather suggestions for improvement.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with our company's sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a 4-point Likert scale to measure familiarity. Avoid neutral midpoint for forced choice.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with our company's sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainability programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include 'None of the above' to capture non-participation. Allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainability programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current sustainability programs offered by the company?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale with neutral midpoint. Helps measure overall satisfaction.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current sustainability programs offered by the company?

questions.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented in our workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback. Limit to 250 characters.

script.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented in our workplace?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to participate in future sustainability programs if they align with your interests?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure future participation intent.
